website_summaries.verdict: A heated eyelash curler that offers a wide range of special features but still comes in at a more affordable price point than much of the competition.
pros: Slim, compact design makes it ideal for taking on the go
Includes protective cover to keep the curler clean
Features an LED light so you can curl your lashes even in dim settings
cons: Some users find it requires multiple passes with the comb to curl lashes

customer_reviews.title: It does do the job AS LONG as you have mascara on
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried this product I gave it a bad review as I used it prior to putting mascara on and it didn’t work, however, I changed my mind today. I put on my mascara and then used this curler, and it made a huge difference. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Richard LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: Loved this eyelash curler,It's gorgeous.The colour makes them look really expensive. Can be used before or after applying mascara. I tried both with equally good results.It's easy to use wiith no slippage when trying to curl lashes,which with my sparse lashes was a godsend. Showed my friend as I was so impressed and she loved them too and has vowed to buy some for herself and daughters. Great little product wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews that got me to purchase this thing, but I have huge regrets. It does curl your eyelashes, but if you have small straight thin eyelashes, you can barely tell. It's a very small curl, nothing like you would get with a standard eye lash curler. It also takes 6 minutes for me to curl my lashes with this. I've tried both ways, with mascara and without. It's not the easiest to clean so I don't recommend with mascara. The only plus is it doesn't rip out your eye lashes but overall I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thin, irregularly curly lashes that have been an absolute curse. The ones on the outside edges curl inwards towards my nose, and curlers make it worse. Most heated curlers don't get hot enough to make a difference, but this one does! I comb down from the top and slightly outwards, and it effectively straightens my lashes! Then I sweep up from below like normal and I end up with beautifully flared, normally curved lashes. And it works without mascara on as well as with! Total lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I researched eye lash curlers for a couple of weeks and decided I wanted a heated one. I did a search for best curlers and this one came out on top. I have been very pleased with how easy it is to use and the way it works curling my lashes and helping to train them do that they are straighter - they usually go sideways. I curl them, add a layer of mascara and then curl them again. It works beautifully on my upper and lower lashes. It deserves the great reviews and being on top of the list.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. These eyelash curlers are fabulous and much better than the one I used to use and didnt last for very long. I use a waterproof mascara on my downward growing lashes, let it dry and then use this to curl
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a different brand for the last year that worked very well, but died after 1 year of use. I purchased this as a replacement but it doesn’t work nearly as well! I don’t think it gets hot enough to curl my lashes. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: My favourite eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye lash curler. Its so easy to use and you dont have to worry about pulling out eyelashes with this. I get good results everytime. My best recommandation is to use this after you put mascara on and let it dry a little bit. Dont go in right away after you have just put the mascara on because then it tends to look a bit clumpy. The only complaint i have about this product is it seems to go through batteries very fast. Other then that its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten rawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this eyelash curler! I was looking for something that didn't pinch my lashes because I have a problem with them falling out. This is the holy grail! I let it warm up while I put on makeup, then push my eyelashes up and hold for about 10 seconds a couple of times. Put on mascara, do one more pass with the wand, and my eyelashes look great all day!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I’ve always used a traditional lash curler but wanted something that didn’t crimp my lashes and cause them to break as easily. This works great! I can already tell my lashes seem fuller and longer. It heats up enough to do the trick but not to burn you. I’ll never go back to the regular kind! I use it before mascara but you can use it after you apply as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I have owned countless heated eyelash curlers. Previous purchases never lived up to the hype. This curler does what it is supposed to do! It heats up quickly & puts a great curl in my lashes. I am so pleased. The packaging is nice as well. Has a nice cap that fits over the heating comb. Using mascara before curling is a must. Great little gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and holds the curl all day
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this because the reviews were pretty positive, but I was definitely skeptical, but I was pleasantly surprised to find out it works. I’ve only used it twice, but the curl has lasted all day. In the last couple years my eyelashes have decided they don’t want to hold a curl and this is the first think I’ve found that’s done the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: 1. The packaging was damaged and the cap was broke. I didn't think that would matter if the product worked... 2. This product does not work. It does not "curl" your lashes. In fact, it might make them MORE straight. I typically will heat my normal eyelash curler and then curl my lashes...I thought this would be an easier and safer way, but it totally doesn't work...I'd give it 0-stars if I could. Don't waste your money...returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schuster

customer_reviews.title: It works—good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It looks weird and there is a little bit of a learning curve but it works way better than any heated curler I’ve ever used—Japonesque, Sephora, ULTA etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Now I can rock curled lashes!! I was born with stick straight lashes and the regular lash curlers always ended plucking what few lashes I had instead of curling them. Btw, I have straight, short, thin, Asian lashes. This tool plus the maybelline waterproof (because my eyes water) and my lashes stayed curled all day! Plus it heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't actually burned myself, but it doesn't feel great.
customer_reviews.text: If you're ok with hot tools close to your eyeballs then give it a go. I value my vision so I am going to discontinue use. The product is as described tho, so this might be a personal problem. Wouldn't buy again. xoxo
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lop

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for curling eyelashes after the mascara has dried. I've changed to using this instead of a traditional manual curler because I tend to lose far less product from the lashes when using this. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Murasaki Kitsune

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use. It gets warm within 30 seconds. However, I still need to use my old fashioned curler with it. My routine is I use my old fashioned curler first, then put on mascara, then use this product to help separate the lashes. It works much better that way.
customer_reviews.author: Nalini

customer_reviews.title: Amazing curl
customer_reviews.text: When I receive this product I was able to use it for about a week and a half until it died and did not work. I did troubleshoot and I replaced the battery but that did not help I wrote the seller and they replaced it with a new product so I just started using that. When this product works it is fabulous. It is easy to use. I use it both before my mascara and after my mascara dries and you could definitely tell the difference. The curl lasts all day. Giving it another shot with the second one I hope it holds out longer than a week and a half.
customer_reviews.author: supermom

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: It works great and less pain to curl my eyelashes up. One thing is that it draws pretty good amount of battery up quickly. I thought it was broken after about full 2 weeks of using, but when I changed battery it worked again.
customer_reviews.author: Ddasan

customer_reviews.title: Great curler, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eyelash curler. I have had it for a week and it seriously has been amazing. Originally I was going to get a Shu Uemura curler after my cousin had suggested it to me, but on Amazon this one had a larger percentage of positive reviews so I decided to take my chances. I'm glad that I did! It curls nicely and apparently if you go to the Japonesque site, they give you free refills (not sure if they do this if you buy from Amazon though). Last note, I am asian with monolids and hard-to-curl eyelashes - this curler has been magical for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: Worls great, easy to use, and curls lashes perfect! Tried without mascara on first as directed, but you can definitely use after too! Helped a few lashes that lost its curl too! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I'm not using it correctly
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the videos that I watched seemed a lot easier than when I actually got it. I started using it, and maybe I'm not doing it correctly, I feel like it didn't curl my eyelashes like they're supposed to be. I even tried curling my eyelashes with my eyelash curler and then applying mascara on, and then using it--didn't really work for me. Worth a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Suong-Kathy Van

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a week
customer_reviews.text: First of all this product was way too much trouble for the little effect you get. Second, it only lasted a week and stopped working. I wouldn't recommend even if it hadn't stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: ShefNBama

customer_reviews.title: This does nothing
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing to my eyelashes with or without mascara and it never achieved the same or even similar volume to a regular curler, super gimmicky and it looks and feels super cheap
customer_reviews.author: Khalysee

customer_reviews.title: Best invention EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is an answer to not wanting to crimp eyelashes every day! I love it! Best invention ever! So easy to use. Only problem I’ve had is I left it on one day and ran battery down. Wish it had a automatic shut off switch!
customer_reviews.author: BRma

customer_reviews.title: Love my electric eye lash curler!!
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes tend to stick straight out, not up. Every time I used a traditional lash curler, it would pull out a lash or two. It also didn’t do an even curl every time. This electric curler protects your lashes, and curls them well! I followed the instructions, applying a coat of mascara first. Then I curl the lashes. For night, I apply a second coat. It is incredibly easy to use. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, and effective
customer_reviews.text: Small and wireless so it isn't a hassle to use. Simple instructions. It helps give that extra lift that a regular eyelash curler can't quite get. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Meh, but curls after applying base coat of mascara. Prefer my old method
customer_reviews.text: I feel it should be a tad warmer and faster. Gives a nice curl but so does a hair dryer to a standard lash curler. Should be cheaper or “wow” me more.
customer_reviews.author: D-leichtful

customer_reviews.title: Quick working after a month or so
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderful for about a month and then died. I’ll be spending money on a better one seeing as the concept works and I did love it while it did work.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Adds just the right touch of curl to stick straight lashes. I hold it in my lashes for about 20 seconds. It’s warm but not hot and tada, there’s curl.
customer_reviews.author: M. Christoffersen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic, also defective
customer_reviews.text: When I took it out of the box, it just felt cheap. And it would not heat, tried several batteries. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: heatherbree23

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but make sure your eyelashes are DRY!
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, works well, boxed nicely. Just make sure your lashes are completely DRY before using or you will make a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Desjardins

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Needs More Heat
customer_reviews.text: It has been the best heated eyelash curler I’ve used so far, but it’s still not hot enough to curl my lashes fast. It takes more than a few times to curl them. I say it IS the best I’ve used because it is hotter than all the others which barely warmed up.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite new beauty tool!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I waited so long to buy one of these. I was not blessed with long, beautiful lashes, but you’d never be able to tell now. After one coat of mascara and my heated eyelash curler, my lashes look every bit as good as those who wear falsies. I highly recommend this! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amber F

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this heated eyelash curler, but it truly disappoints. Noticed no difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dcuc

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little device because it's quick and easy to use. I'm not crazy about the bright light on it but some people may appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Staton

customer_reviews.title: Sent It back!
customer_reviews.text: Returning it. Won’t hold a charge. Poorly translated instructions. Curls as well as a normal eyelash curler
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work Tried this from a friend. She had a different brand Hers worked. Mine didn’t
customer_reviews.author: Robin Leos

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It works okay. Did not curl my lashes too much. It did curl a little if that is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Xun Chen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly and nicely packaged.I tried them immediately and they instantly gave my lashes a lovely curl. They easily enclose all your eyelashes, so you don't have that half done curl that needs doing over again. I've had lots of eyelash curlers over the years but not as well made as these. Lovely product. The curl also stayed in all day even without mascara.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: This was the best eyelash curler I have ever had in my entire life!! It works wonders and my elashes look amazing. I've always had extremely long eyelashes & it takes me forever to find an eyelash curler that will actually curl them. This eyelash curler made my eyelashes go up all the way & actually touch my eyebrows!! I love it so much and will definitely buy another when needed (:
customer_reviews.author: ethan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an eyelash curler that cost as much as the Japonesque, but this is definitely worth it. With my old one that I bought at the local drugstore, I frequently pinched my eyelid or mashed my cheek. The design of the Japonesque is much better and avoids both of those unpleasant events. The curler works faster and better than the less expensive brands, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, compact but not as functional as i would like
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt heat up as quickly or as well as i like and doesnt curl as well but its cute
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Polanco

customer_reviews.title: HOT!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this heated lash curler for years. I love this one it's electric. Its heats up QUICK and gets hot. The combs are further apart than what I'm used to so I have to be careful not to get it too close to my lash line--its hot enough to burn. I'm a big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really upset when I put a battery in and waited to use it, but it didn't heat up. I sent it back. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: cari tiensivu

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Broke with weeks - appears to be made out of cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective on bare lashes.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s because I don’t wear mascara, but the effect I noticed was so subtle that I could hardly tell if it had any effect at all, and haven’t bothered to use it all after trying it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Cailin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's tricky to get use to but I don't think that it curls the eyelashes all that much.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the manual curlers
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really notice much of a curl using this.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted! The only problem is the amount of batteries I have used, but it may be how often I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Golden

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Works really well,I use it for my eyelashes that are too curly so straighten them out a bit. Heats up fast . I only use it before I put on mascara, I can’t imagine how messy it would get if I had mascara on while using it
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Piece of Chinese throw-away. On off switch somehow not right. Disappointed! Total waste..... if had seen at Dollar Store, would have passed it up.
customer_reviews.author: RoxE

customer_reviews.title: Does not work am straight lashes
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing to my lashes, but I have impossibly straight Asian lashes that only respond to eyelash curlers. I was hoping this would be a gentler alternative, but that was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: FitMom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found a good use for the smaller eyelash curler, other than maybe for the bottom lashes or in the top corner, but haven't played with it that much. I like the larger curler. It works great and doesn't pinch my skin. i don't care for the tweezers, but they were just a bonus item anyway. Would recommend this curler.
customer_reviews.author: Behilda Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have long lashes & an eyelash curler is necessary. I recommend this one. Easy to hold too which is a plus since I have arthritis in my hand/fingers. I always heat the curler, but this one works great even without heat ' In my pic the left is curled without heat for just a few seconds, nothing on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Harkness

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work at all. I used it after I put mascara on and I thought MAYBE it had worked, but if it did it was hardly noticeable. I ended up using a curler
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing product, although it the curls don’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Mims

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay but not safe
customer_reviews.text: Take a lot of time to curl my eye lashes I only use it twice cause it’s hot for my eyes scary to use
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Visitacion

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing
customer_reviews.text: This eyelash curler did nothing to curl my eyelashes. Barely gets warm. Don't waste your money but use the traditional eyelash curler that we have been using for many years
customer_reviews.author: Alice Chanover

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a months use
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after about a month so I changed the batteries thinking that was the problem. Worked a couple more times then stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Tomchik

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this eyelash curler. My lashes like to stick straight out and I only seem to be able to get them to curl with a heated eye lash curler. My last one used batteries and I was replacing the batter every 2 or 3 days.I am so happy! It lasts a long time and the temperature is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am in absolute love with this product! It curls my lashes beautiful and I used to be quite scared about using eye lash curlers as my old ones pulled my lashes out or pinched my eyelids. These just fit perfectly round the base of my lashes. I would definitely recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Nelly parra

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a month after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use & effective however stopped working a month after I received it. I didn’t use in excess. Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works rather well; just make sure to read and follow the directions! It works if you use mascara first then curl your eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really have enjoyed using this
customer_reviews.text: Really have enjoyed using this. Did read reviews on getting best results (using metal eyelash curler first followed up by heated eyelash curler; “fixing” curl with mascara; using eyelash comb/brush to separate eyelashes). Very pleased with results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I like he look of the packaging! very small, cute, and compact! it curled my lashes very well and they look naturally curled! overall in love and i will be ditching my old metal eyelash curler
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Loved it... Ive used other ones and nothing ever worked nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Competitively priced and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have deep set eyes and the only eyelash curlers that have ever worked are from Cover Girl and Maybelline. I have used one or the other for about 40 years. This particle curler was competitively priced and convenient to order.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Paddie

customer_reviews.title: Big difference and thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Who new a little gadget could make such a difference. I have long but straight lashes - with squeeze curlers they always looked odd. Now they curl from the root and I get compliments all the time! Heats quick and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Heat temp indicator does not work. Has a bad connection to the batteries. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Barno

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work cheap piece of carp
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars didn’t work on my eyelashes at all. Got warm but not enough to curl. Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It does not work very well. It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: deavic

customer_reviews.title: Takes more time
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work as well as I hoped and took awhile to get warmed up.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Burns off Eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: DONT USE THIS. It burned off my eyelashes and is a cheap piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Best eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyelash curler I've probably ever used. It appears to be made really well
customer_reviews.author: skyler smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all! Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Would give zero stars if possible. I purchased this curler and was excited to use it but it did not even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Does not work! I have tried two different new batteries and could not get it to work/ warm up. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: I am very glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, just make sure your mascara is dry before you use it
customer_reviews.author: Lasher

customer_reviews.title: Love this curler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this curler! No pulling my lashes and it curls perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Don't have to wear mascara
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear makeup that often and I really hate the eyelash curlers that crimp your lashes. This curler heats and curls quickly with or without mascara. I've used this mostly without mascara to give my natural lashes a girl in the morning. The guard keeps you from burning your eyelid. Overall I would purchase again because the price is comperable to a regular eyelash curler, and it does the job well without me accidentally pulling out lashes in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Houston

customer_reviews.title: Love the curved wand
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the curve in the wand. It makes it so much easier to curl out your lashes than with a straight heated eyelash wand. It does a great job. Only downside is it being battery operated. But that's not enough to make me lower the score to anything but the 5 stars I gave it because it does a great job and if you don't forget to turn it off when you're done with it, then the battery should last you a fair amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: lostcarolina

customer_reviews.title: Great url but doesnt seem to hold long
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but it heated quickly amd curls well! I followed instructions to use mascara prior to use. The device is small so I feel the cost is slightly pricey but it seems to be good quality. Con is that its battery operated. I feel a plug in charger would be better for my needs but I'm sure this device doesnt use much power and thus the battery should last a while. Edit: I'm not sure if it's something I'm doing wrong but it seems the curl doesn't hold long.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little eyelash curler!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was great. I got it very quickly. I used this several times and loved it. My daughter wanted to try it and now she won't give it back... guess I'll be buying a second one. It heats up quickly and there's no way you are going to get burned.
customer_reviews.author: SusanKS1959

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I was skeptical but willing to give it a try. I have very straight Asian eyelashes and this actually curled them and they held the curl all day. They key is finding the right mascara to pair this with. Mine kind of clumps when it's heated so I'm looking for a new brand. I also would probably benefit from buying an eyelash comb to separate my lashes after curling them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Replacement works great!
customer_reviews.text: Changed review: The customer service department contacted me and sent a replacement curler. It works fantastically well! The first curler must have been defective. The new one has two distinct settings that work at different temperatures. Very pleased. It doesn't heat up enough to produce curl. My eyelashes are very fine, and it doesn't take much, but this hardly heats at all on the high setting. The low setting could also be called "room temperature." This is the third, most expensive, and worst heated eyelash curler I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Mcclung

customer_reviews.title: Clever!
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this curler (unlike others) is that not only does it curl fantastically, but it’s designed in such a way that when you recap it, it forces the On button into the Off position, so there’s no chance of you leaving it on and letting the battery run out (unless you don’t recap it). Clever! A+ in design.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use eyelash Curler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this not knowing what to expect, but I rather like it! It saves my eyelashes from the standard eyelash curler I had been using. Not loosing eyelashes nearly as much from breakage. Easy to use. Light weight Color pink and white Take 1 triple A battery Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: C.Laino

customer_reviews.title: Nope, didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Despite burning my eyelid, this product only created a curl in my lashes for about a minute. After taking about 5 minutes to get to the top hearing level, the curler held my lashes, but could not curl better than a normal, metal eyelashes curler
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Good idea except mine did not work it kept killing the battery before I could curl my eyelashes
customer_reviews.author: Teredr

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one week.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first. It worked nicely and heat up the first week I got it and then it would light up but not warm up. I hope it was just a glitch in one and that when I order next time it will last longer. But it did work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works better than traditional curler
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this because it does give my stubborn lashes a bit of curl. The batteries seem to wear out fast in it for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. I use Blinc mascara and wait for it to dry before curling. It seems to work best if I close my eyes and flip up for 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: AWB

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat up enough to curl lashes
customer_reviews.text: pro: nice design con: does not heat up enough to curl lashes eyelash curler stopped working after one month. I'm going to repurchase the Panasonic version ( which lasts about 9 months before needing to be replaced)
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: it works well. I've had it for about a week now. I like it much better than my old regular curler. Now my lashes stay curled all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie P.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It lifted my eyelashes for a few minutes but they didnt stay. I tried with and without mascara. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I would say this lifts lashes but does not curl by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful results!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This eyelash curler does everything it promises, with beautiful results. Very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for your money
customer_reviews.text: Make sure your battery is fresh otherwise it won't heat up enough to curl your eyelashes. Good for the price. Doesn't stay all day, but neither do the curls in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This  did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions on how to use. But I still could not grt it to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Visa

product_meta.title: Eyelash Curler,Electric Upgraded Portable Heated Automatic Eyelash Curlers with LED Light Eye Curlers (Pink)
product_meta.description:
Eyelash Curlers,Electric Mini Portable Heated Electric Lashes Curler with LED Light By eTTgear 

Features: 
This electric eyelash curlers is operated by battery,it can make your eyelash more curled and beautful.and it's safety and quickly 
Temperature indicator changes from purple to pink when ready for use 
Easy to Clean,Cleaning brush included for easy removal of dirt 
Complete Set,It's included a comb,lures and separates your eyelashes gently and gently

Specifications: 
Material: ABS plastic 
Character: Electric eyelash curler, heated 
Power supply: 1 x AAA battery（Battery not included） 
Dimensions: 2.5 x 2.5 x 11.6 cm 
Voltage: DC 1.5V 
Net weight: 16 g

Package Included: 
1 x eyelash curler, heated 
1 x colored packaging

How to use the heated eyelash curler? 
1. Select 1st or 2nd gear according to your needs (When the ambient temperature is 24°, 1st gear temperature is 40+-5°, 2nd gear temperature is 70+-5°) 
2.30 seconds rapid warm-up, when the pink gel becomes colorless, you can use the eyelash curler 
3. Apply mascara evenly 
4. Place the brush of the eyelashes under the eyelashes, wait for a few seconds, and slowly lift up. Then divide the root, middle, and tail, and press each step for 3-5 seconds

Beauty Eyelash Tips: 
Brush mascara first, then use eyelash curler, the effect is especially noticeable

Note: 
Beauty care products can have different effects on different skin types
feature_bullets: ❤ BETTER THAN TRADITIONAL SET - This automatic eyelash curler is operated by battery.Better than manual set.A few seconds fast hot roll, simple, fast, curling, natural, painless, will not hurt the skin, damage eyelashes, double temperature,Led lamp light heat protection, safe and fast, , traditional manual set easy to break and damage

❤ MAKES YOU CHARMING IN 2 MINS- 30 seconds quick warm-up.Select 1st or 2nd gear according to your needs.when the pink gel becomes colorless, you can use the eyelash curler.Apply mascara evenly.then Place the brush of the eyelashes under the eyelashes, wait for a few seconds, and slowly lift up. Then divide the root, middle, and tail, and press each step for 3-5 seconds.Amazing and curer eyelash is done

❤ PAINLESS&NO DAMAGE - 2 temperature can be chosen.The Heater adopts new pure aluminum metal heat transfer to better protect the ciliary.Hair is not damaged when curled at high temperatures.Painless, fast and safe - no pinching, pulling or pulling of the eyelid and eyelashes

❤ EASY TO USE&CLEAN - Combs and Cleaning brush are included.Comb teeth are used for combing after using mascara, eliminating the trouble of "flies legs";After combing, the back combed teeth are heated and fixed for the eyelashes.make eyelash more curler.The brush can help you clean dirt easily and deeply
❤ ANYTIME ANYWHERE CAN USE - This cute eyelash curler is lightweight,portable,compact and durable,Dating,working,shopping can be taken and used anytime anywhere.make you always looks charming
